summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing execution of an amendment to the concession agreement with Volume Services, Inc. and Seattle Center Catering, Inc. to terminate the Concessionaire's exclusive catering right in the Opera House and Playhouse, revise the percentage and minimum payments to be received by the City for catering and concession activity, grant the concessionaire the right to sell program and novelties at the Seattle Center, and make other changes therein.
